title: OtC - MIST SD LAN/WLAN - Process design
description:
Description
As a customer
I want to get a new MIST SD LAN/WIFI solution and to be informed about all the steps that I have to go through, and it is clear which parameters and information I have to contribute.
So that there are no obstacles caused by me at the start and I can use all the advantages from the MIST SD LAN/WIFI solution.
  As a Telekom employee
I want to know what my role is, and which tasks and process steps I go through for a new MIST SD LAN/WIFI by implementing a clean, straightforward and well documented process with clear responsibilities, where possible automated.
So that the customer receives a functional MIST SD LAN/WIFI solution.
acceptance_criteria: The commissioning of the DTA is considered
Coupling information in the site are considered (one bill)
It is clear who executes which tasks
Interfaces and parameters to other systems are defined and coordinated
Documentation is finished (Aris â€“ Happy Path and Fallouts)

components.title: OKR#10_PI7 Start Technical Onboarding in Snow for SD LAN/WLAN
OKR#11_PI7 Invoice generation for SD LAN/WLAN
OtC Onboarding, order, procurement, field service
